name: Zordak
description:
NOTE:

This is just a demo for now, the final game will have a price.

Short description:

Zordak is a metroidvania, mostly inspired by Super Metroid.

You explore, find items that help you along the way, discover secrets and more.

A bit of story:

You wake up from an unusually long cryosleep, only to discover that this place is not what it's supposed to be.

Everyone is dead and the facility has been abandoned.

You seem to be the only survivor.

You now have to do what you must to survive and embark on your journey in the search for another human being.

Additional Info:

Looking for any kind of feedback, so please leave a comment and tell me what you think!

Or check out my twitter and/or devlog for more information about the game!

https://forum.yoyogames.com/index.php?threads/zordak.43923/

https://twitter.com/ApapappaGames

Minimum System Requirements:

OS: Windows 7 or higher

Processor: 1.66 GHz

Memory: 512 MB RAM

Graphics: Intel HD Graphics

DirectX: 9.0

Additional Notes: Keyboard or Controller/Gamepad supported.

Controller/Gamepad recommended for best experience.
